meanings.definition: Full of soft, fluffy volume or shape.
meanings.sent1: The cat's pouffy tail swished back and forth.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pouffy dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The pouffy clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: Her pouffy cheeks made her look like a cute chipmunk.
meanings.sent5: The pouffy pillow was so comfortable to rest on.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle or clothing item that is voluminous and fluffy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her pouffy hairstyle added height to her head.
meanings.sent2: The princess wore a pouffy gown to the ball.
meanings.sent3: The pouffy wig made him look like a funny clown.
meanings.sent4: The pouffy skirt twirled gracefully as she danced.
meanings.sent5: The pouffy sleeves of the dress made her feel like a fairy.
